Grace I think its a joke...I found it too a long time ago and posted a
link at the miburo list...read the end of the article..the most
devoted students of Japanese at the univ. where I got my undergrad
degree were passing it around and even wrote the link on the board
(one of my class sessions was held in a foreign language
building)...anyways those students thought it was a riot and they
majored in Japanese.  Don't worry about it ^_^

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Grace Battista" <wounds@s...> wrote:
> I was looking for some good Japanese textbooks to help in my study of 
> Nihonggo when I came across this article. I was almost tempted to 
> send the guy a dispute but thought better of it since it would be a 
> waste of my time to convince him otherwise. However I am posting it 
> here just to show how narrow minded some people are and to alleviate 
> the pounding in my head...
> 
> Here's the link if anyone is interested...
> 
> http://www-unix.oit.umass.edu/~thoureau/japanese.html
